event.title: Web Design
event.description:
In Today’s world what we used to get the informations, or browse or everything or whatever it maybe we use only webpage. WebPage is web language used to create the webpages. Things we used to view in the webpage can be created by using web language. Not only that, web language is used to manage the datas provided by the user in the webpage say username & passwords etc., Web Design has an pre-definded language codes or syntax which is designed as per to display the contents which we coded in the .html document/file. It doesn’t depends on any platform and can be run every browser and in any Operating Platform but few specified programs will be run depends on the user’s wish say Flash, etc., Web Design has HTML as fundamental medium to run the web languages and it acts as a compiler. HTML is nothing but Hyper Text Markup Language. We use every elements within the anchor brackets. then only the execution will takes place.
I learned Web Design course in INVOKES TECHNOLOGIES an decent infrastructure place. If you need to learn about look up their site. Because they are official approved web design course training in chennai
